emuInput.TitMainTitle: C.J. Evans Jr. standing in Foremost Dairy booth advertising peach ice cream, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances...6. The Foremost Dairies, Inc., booth was the children's delight. Frozen, delicious ice cream bars were passed out the hundreds as visitors made repeated visits several times during the three evenings.  C.J. Evans Jr. was the representative...Harris Photo."
